short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simply enter when and how long you want to work and suitable shifts will be booked automatically as soon as they become available.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you want more shifts?
Check out Shift catcher for the Rider app!

Shift catcher is a browser extension that searches for available shifts and automatically books swaps for you.

Simply add the shifts you want to your list by entering desired date, time range, duration range and starting area.

Click 'Search for shifts' and Shift catcher will frequently reload the Available sessions tab within the Rider app and book suitable shifts as soon as they become available.
